title: 8 best Macy's end-of-year sale deals to avail for New Year 2024
text:
It is almost the end of the year but the good news is that you can still avail Macy's end-of-year sale deals before 2024 ends. if you are planning to get anything for yourself for the new year or you have some last-minute gifts you are planning to get, now is your chance.
Macy's end-of-year sale has deals on almost every category with up to 70% off. If you are looking for makeup, boots, jackets, or even fine jewelry, Macy's has got you covered.
Keep reading to know some of the deals you can avail of from Macy's end-of-year sale.
8 deals to get from Macy's end-of-year sale
If you still have a few things to cross from your wishlist, head over to Macy's website where you can get up to 70% off on various categories.
Here are a few deals you do not want to miss.
Clinique Dramatically Different Moisturizing Face Lotion+
Stock up on your moisturizer during the cold and dry winter months. This [Clinique](https://www.soapcentral.com/lifestyle/8-best-beauty-deals-avail-ulta-beauty-holiday-sale-new-year-2025) moisturizer comes in four different sizes, from 0.50 oz to 6.70 oz. This is one of Clinique's best-selling lotions because it locks in 8 hours of hydration and strengthens your skin.
Head over to Macy's website right now where the 4.20 oz is available for only $25.50 instead of $34.
Michael Kors Women's Faux-Fur-Trim Hooded Puffer Coat
There is nothing wrong with adding another puffer coat to your winter wardrobe. The [Michael Kors](https://www.soapcentral.com/lifestyle/michael-kors-black-friday-2024-5-best-handbag-deals-snag-right-away) Faux-Fur Hooded Puffer Coat is available in six different colors. All you have to know about it is that the coat is water-resistant and lined.
This is a limited-time special item that is available on Macy's online store for $89.99 after a 65% discount.
Macy's Diamond Four-Prong Stud Earrings
Simple and minimalistic always do the trick when it comes to [jewelry](https://www.soapcentral.com/lifestyle/10-macy-s-cyber-monday-jewelry-deals-good-pass). These diamond studs are elegant and chic. They can be easily styled with a casual outfit or worn to work. They can also be worn for a date night out with your hair up to really show them off.
Get yourself a pair from Macy's while they are 40% off. All you have to pay is $720.
Michael Kors Fisherman's Rib Beanie and Scarf Boxed Gift Set
If you are still gift hunting, this Michael Kors Gift Set would be great for anyone. It comes with a beanie and a scarf with the knitted text 'KORS' on it. It comes in three different colors: Deep Fuschia, Black, and Dark Camel.
At 49% off, you can purchase this set from Macy's website at just $49.99.
Macy's Aquamarine & Diamond Halo Ring in 14k White Gold
Add another piece of fine jewelry to your collection with Macy's Aquamarine & Diamond Halo Ring. This ring is like staring into a deep blue sea with an aquamarine stone with diamonds around set in 14k gold.
Macy's has a 73% offer on this ring. Get it from the website at $1,120.74.
Calvin Klein Men's Mayden Slim-Fit Wool Blend Overcoat
Get ready for the upcoming [New Year](https://www.soapcentral.com/humor/12-funny-memes-perfectly-capture-chaos-new-year-s-eve) parties with the Calvin Klein Slim-Fit Wool Blend Overcoat. It is available in six dark shades and is made of a combination of wool, polyester, and other fabrics.
The overcoat is available for purchase at Macy's at just $123.74 after a 75% discount for the Macy's end-of-year sale.
Clinique Almost Lipstick in Black Honey
Beat the chapped lips this winter season with the Clinique Almost Lipstick. It is the Number 1 lip color in the US in 2023, but that does not mean the color is out of trend. It is also available in Pink Honey.
It is 25% off while the Macy's end-of-year sale is going on. Get it now for just $18.75.
Cole Haan Women's Quilted Leather Gloves
Don't forget to complete your New Year outfit with these quilted leather gloves. Not only are they stylish, they will also keep your hands warm and toasty. They come in three different colors: Black, Pinot, and British Tan.
Head over to Macy's to grab yourself a pair while the Macy's end-of-year sale is live. Get them at just $29.99 after a 69% discount.
Don't miss Macy's end-of-year sale as it might be their last sale this year. You can get deals on various products and categories including jewelry, makeup, apparel, shoes, and more. Happy shopping!
